high_descs: Head rotate and turn right to the bed.
Pick the fruit from the bed.
Turn left to the desk lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine a fruit by the light of a desk lamp.

high_descs: turn right and turn right and walk towards the bed
pick up the slice of the watermelon from the bed
turn around towards the desk lamp
anns.task_desc: picking up a slice of watermelon and turning on a lamp

high_descs: Turn around and head straight towards bed
turn right and head straight to desk lamp
anns.task_desc: Examine a watermelon by the light of a desk lamp.
